# Copilot Instructions for OpenCloud Downloader

## Project Overview

this repository synchronizes local files from a spaces hosted in OpenCloud (https://opencloud.eu)

For communication the WebDAV interface to file spaces is used:
https://docs.opencloud.eu/de/docs/user/admin/web-dav


## Technology used

The project is a standard maven project.
It is a simple command line tool, which tries not to use too many other libraries.
